title: Topic 001 Question 112
body: You are designing a new gaming application that uses a highly transactional relational database to store player authentication and inventory data in Google Cloud. You want to launch the game in multiple regions. What should you do?
options: Use Cloud Spanner to deploy the database.
Use Bigtable with clusters in multiple regions to deploy the database
Use BigQuery to deploy the database
Use Cloud SQL with a regional read replica to deploy the database.
